name: armenia-example
title: Example data: Armenia BOOST, approved
description: The subset of the Armenia BOOST dataset with 'approved' status, transformed into an example of a well-formed budget data package.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier for the budget item.

fields.name: admin
fields.description: The name of the government entity responsible for spending the budgeted amount.

fields.name: cofog
fields.description: The COFOG functional classification for the budget item.

fields.name: gfsmExpense
fields.description: The GFSM 2001 economic classification for the budget item.

fields.name: programID
fields.description: Code of the government program underwriting the budget item.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of money associated with this budget item.
